name: Hollywood Full Figure Beauty - Plus Size Dress Up
name_original: Hollywood Full Figure Beauty - Plus Size Dress Up
description:
Uncover the secret behind looking appealing and attractive as a plus size!Show off your best fashion statement! Dress this Hollywood Full Figure Beauty up with the newest fashion style straight off the runways. Choose from stylish and classy clothing, accessories from real brands, and trendy hairstyle.

Follow the newest fashion trends and keep that cool fashion sense! Exciting fun and addicting dress up game.

HOW TO PLAY:

Tap the screen and start dressing your Hollywood Beauty.

-Fashionable Clothes and Accessories
-Trendy Hairstyles
-Awesome Backgrounds
-Cool Sounds

Challenge Your Friends and See Who Creates the Trendiest and Fashionable Looks!

EXCITING FUN!!

Download ‘Hollywood Full Figure Beauty – Plus Size Dress Up’ now and have some fun.
